entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is mentioned as speaking to someone, indicating he is a person present in the scene. The text states 'my Lord' which suggests Lucius is addressing someone with a title, implying a hierarchical relationship.

relationships.description: Lucius addresses the Lord, indicating a relationship of authority or respect between them. The text states 'my Lord' which suggests Lucius is showing deference to the Lord.
